title: A breefe treatise of the vertue of the crosse and the true manner hovv to honour it. Translated out of French into English.
author: La Faye, Antoine de, 1540-1615.
publisher: Printed [by E. Allde] for Edward VVhite, and are to be sold at the little North doore of S. Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun,
notes: A translation, by Anthony Munday, of Antoine de La Faye's: Brief traicté de la vertu de la croix et de la manière de l'honnorer. La Faye's treatise is a refutation of Francis de Sales's 'Défense de l'estendart de la Saincte Croix'.
A variant: the dedication is signed by the translator, Anthony Munday--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
